ModMetaData.name: Warhammer 40.000: Imperium Materials
ModMetaData.author: flangopink, Ogam
ModMetaData.description:
Warhammer 40.000 - is a collaboration project between many artists and coder to bring vanilla taste to the blood of Warhammer world. Motto of this project is: "Vanilla art, vanilla balance, fuck the VOID".
Imperium materials brought to you few options to spice up your gameplay, for example exceptionally durable Ferrocrete or shiny Auramite as substitute for plain gold.
